name: workero-backend
description: Workero Backend API - Laravel PHP application

scripts.build: php artisan route:cache && php artisan event:cache && composer dump-autoload --optimize --classmap-authoritative
scripts.optimize: php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan event:cache
scripts.clear: php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear
